comments: These divisors represent a special case of the "nice angles" discussed at the Geometry Center when bending generating triangles to construct polyhedra - _Alford Arnold_, Apr 16 2000180 is a highly composite number: A002182(11)=180. [From _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 21 2010]
links: Index entries for sequences related to divisors of numbers
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
